metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3624 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Various methods in WEBrick::HTTPRequest in Ruby 1.9.2 and 1.8.7 and earlier do not validate the X-Forwarded-For, X-Forwarded-Host and X-Forwarded-Server headers in requests, which might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary text into log files or bypass intended address parsing via a crafted header.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Upstream is still unpatched mdeslaur> still no upstream fix as of 2019-04-10

criterions.comment: ruby1.9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
